text: (He paigambara!) Tumhi sanga, majhya palanakartyane mala n'yayaca adesa dila ahe ani pratyeka sajada karateveli apala cehara sarala diseta karuna ghya ani tya (allaha) karita dina (dharma) sacca manane svikaruna tyala pukara. Tyane jase tumhala suruvatila nirmana kele, tyaca prakare dusaryandahi nirmana karila
